#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	string str="dhapusv";
	int test;
	std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
	cin>>test;
	while(test--)
	{
		long long num,temp,rem,ind=0;
		string ans="";
		cin>>num;
		temp=num;
		while(temp)
		{
			rem=temp%7;
			//cout<<rem;
			ans[ind++]=rem+48;
			temp=temp/7;
		}
		for(int i=ind-1;i>=0;i--)
		cout<<str[ans[i]-49];
		cout<<endl;
	}
}
